name: Instant Pot® Old-Fashioned Rice Pudding
author: Netsirk
summary: This recipe merges old-fashioned taste with modern technology! Rib sticking, good ol' fashioned rice pudding ready in a fraction of the normal time using an Instant Pot®!
directions: Turn on a multi-functional pressure cooker (such as Instant Pot®) and select Saute function
Warm the mixture, stirring continuously, until sugar dissolves, 3 to 4 minutes
Select high pressure according to manufacturer's instructions; set timer for 15 minutes
Allow 10 to 15 minutes for pressure to build
Release pressure using the natural-release method according to manufacturer's instructions, at least 10 minutes
Remove lid of the Instant Pot®
Scoop 1 cup of pudding mixture out of the pot; add to the beaten eggs and whisk until completely blended
Pour back into the Instant Pot® and add raisins, vanilla extract, and cinnamon
Cook until mixture thickens, about 3 minutes
